writePartitionMap(Map<Integer, Pair<String, String>>) - Method in class system.DataLocator
Writes partition to worker manager ID map to file in the following format : 0:snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu_HJK,snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu 1:snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu_HJK,snoopy.cs.ucsb.edu 2:scooby.cs.ucsb.edu_MNJ,scooby.cs.ucsb.edu 3:scooby.cs.ucsb.edu_MNJ,scooby.cs.ucsb.edu .
